body:
declare @Str nvarchar(max) = N'$PASTE$';

with cteData
as (
    select substring(@Str, 1, 1) as ch, 1 as chidx
    union all
    select substring(@Str, chidx + 1, 1), chidx + 1
    from cteData
    where chidx < len(@Str)
) ,
cteData2
as (
    select res, 1 as iteration
    from (
        select lower(iif(ch not like '[a-z0-9]', '-', ch))
        from cteData
        for xml path('')
    ) t(res)
    union all 
    select fixedRes, iteration + 1
    from cteData2
        cross apply ( select replace(res, '--', '-') as fixedRes ) t
    where len(res) != len(fixedRes)
)
select top(1) 
    substring(
        replace(replace(replace(replace(res, 
        'User-Story-', 'feature/'), 
		'Feature-', 'feature/'), 
		'Task-', 'feature/'), 
		'Bug-', 'bugfix/')
      , 1, 100)
from cteData2
order by iteration desc
option ( maxrecursion 0 )
